text: == Summary == Lara Catherina Stone is a Dutch supermodel. She was discovered at the age of 12 in the Paris Metro and later participated in the Elite Model Look competition at 15. Stone has appeared on the cover of Vogue and has worked with various brands, including Fendi, Chanel, Prada, Louis Vuitton, and Versace. == Personal Life == Lara was born on 20th December 1983 in Geldrop, Noord-Brabant, Netherlands She was married to David Walliams until their divorce in 2015. and later, in 2021, married David Grievson, a property developer. Lara has two children, one with David named Alfred, and one just born last year with her new partner named Bob. Category:Dutch models Category:1983 births
title: Lara Stone
